content:
Craft an item of type: green_dye
inventory=[{"type": "parrot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "cyan_concrete_powder", "quantity": 59, "index": 22}, {"type": "cactus", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "ladder", "quantity": 3, "index": 38}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 29, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a green dye, I need to smelt the cactus at slot 36 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
act: smelt from slot 36 to slot 11 with quantity 1
